Text: World Economic Forum Forbes ReceptionIMAGE Steve Forbes EditorinChief Forbes Magazine Robert L Forbes President Forbes Global FYI cordially invite you and a guest to a private reception on the occasion of the World Economic Forum Annual Meeting on Friday the first of February from ten pm until midnight Club West nd Street between Fifth and Sixth Avenue Please RSVP to Karena Bullock Telephone Fax Email By invitation only nontransferable ForbesInvitedoc
